alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 1:08AM EST until January 11 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Southern Herkimer County. * WHEN...Wind Chill Advisory remains in effect until 3 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chills will occur late tonight into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
